statements: SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches;
SELECT full_name, specialty, hourly_rate FROM vocal_coaches WHERE specialty = 'Classical';
SELECT id, full_name, email FROM vocal_coaches WHERE hourly_rate < 100;
SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT id, full_name, phone_number FROM vocal_coaches WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM vocal_coaches WHERE specialty = 'Classical';
SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches WHERE hourly_rate > 50 AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, full_name, email, hourly_rate FROM vocal_coaches ORDER BY hourly_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches WHERE specialty LIKE '%Pop%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT id, full_name FROM vocal_coaches WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches;
SELECT name, email FROM vocal_coaches WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM vocal_coaches ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lesson_schedule WHERE lesson_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT coach_id, student_name, lesson_date FROM lesson_schedule ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM vocal_coaches WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT coach_id, student_name, lesson_date FROM lesson_schedule WHERE lesson_time BETWEEN '10:00' AND '12:00';
SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT coach_id, COUNT(*) AS total_lessons FROM lesson_schedule GROUP BY coach_id;
SELECT * FROM VocalCoaches;
SELECT coach_name, specialty FROM VocalCoaches WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM ContactInformation ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT lesson_date, lesson_time FROM LessonSchedules WHERE lesson_type = 'Group' AND coach_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, lesson_date FROM LessonSchedules JOIN ContactInformation ON LessonSchedules.student_id = ContactInformation.student_id;
SELECT * FROM VocalCoaches WHERE specialty = 'Pop'
SELECT coach_name, experience_years FROM VocalCoaches ORDER BY experience_years DESC
SELECT * FROM LessonSchedules WHERE lesson_date > '2023-01-01' AND lesson_type = 'Group' ORDER BY lesson_date ASC

SELECT coach_name, lesson_date, lesson_type FROM VocalCoaches JOIN LessonSchedules ON VocalCoaches.coach_id = LessonSchedules.coach_id WHERE LessonSchedules.lesson_type = 'Individual' ORDER BY coach_name, lesson_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT coach_name, email FROM VocalCoaches WHERE coach_id IN (SELECT coach_id FROM LessonSchedules WHERE lesson_type = 'Group' GROUP BY coach_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2)
SELECT * FROM VocalCoaches;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Trainers WHERE trainer_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_id, start_time, end_time FROM Lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT coach_id, first_name, last_name FROM VocalCoaches WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM Schedules WHERE status = 'Confirmed' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM VocalCoaches;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Trainers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT coach_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM VocalCoaches WHERE coach_id = 3;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, start_time, end_time FROM Lessons WHERE lesson_date > '2021-09-01' ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;

SELECT s.schedule_id, l.lesson_date, l.start_time, l.end_time, tc.first_name AS coach_first_name, tt.first_name AS trainer_first_name FROM Schedules s JOIN Lessons l ON s.lesson_id = l.lesson_id JOIN VocalCoaches tc ON l.coach_id = tc.coach_id JOIN Trainers tt ON l.trainer_id = tt.trainer_id WHERE s.status = 'scheduled';
SELECT * FROM vocal_coaches;
SELECT name, email FROM trainers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, lesson_date, venue FROM lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_records WHERE student_phone LIKE '123%';
SELECT s.student_name, l.lesson_date, l.venue FROM student_records s INNER JOIN enrollment e ON s.id = e.student_id INNER JOIN lessons l ON e.lesson_id = l.id;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM vocal_coaches;
SELECT * FROM trainers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lesson_date, lesson_time FROM lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_time;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_records WHERE student_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM enrollment INNER JOIN student_records ON enrollment.student_id = student_records.id INNER JOIN lessons ON enrollment.lesson_id = lessons.id;
